code: import React,{useState}from"react";import Icon from"../Icon";import"./Star.scss";const Star=_ref=>{let{starValue}=_ref;var arr=[];for(var n=0;n<5;n++){arr[n]={fill:false};}const[starFill,setstarFill]=useState(arr);function onStarClick(index,item){console.log(index);starValue(index+1);for(var i=0;i<starFill.length;i++){starFill[i].fill=false;}for(var i=0;i<=index;i++){starFill[i].fill=true;setstarFill(starFill);}setstarFill([...starFill]);}var borderStartIconProps={name:"star-border",slot:"",class:"zoom18",style:{stroke:"#168FE4"}};var startIconProps={name:"star",slot:"",class:"zoom18",style:{stroke:"#168FE4"}};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"starContainer"},starFill.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{key:index,className:"eachStar",onClick:()=>onStarClick(index,item)},!item.fill?/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Icon,{iconProps:borderStartIconProps}):/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Icon,{iconProps:startIconProps}))));};export default Star;
